duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide guidance and mentorship to the medical surgical unit, ensuring a high standard of patient care.
Handle complex issues as they occur in the med/surg unit.
Utilize strong working knowledge of nursing and hospital systems, individual and group behaviors, healthcare, and nursing trends/research.
Apply nursing process, quality assurance, quality improvement, and budget/financial/data base skills in managing the unit.
Be hands-on and visible to both patients and staff in the med/surg unit.
